issue.title: translate.yandex.ru

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.53

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Yandex Browser

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://translate.yandex.ru/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Russian filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. При блокировке рекламы на сайте, блок рекламы исчезает, но структура сайта нарушается. Основные фреймы не по центру и аватарка сдвинута вправо.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Выглядит вот так:</summary>

![Снимок экрана 2023-03-13 010703](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52073031/224704144-69c4a9ab-ea65-48ed-a119-c9ddef23af59.png)
</details>



<details><summary>Должно быть:</summary>

![Снимок экрана 2023-03-13 010733](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52073031/224704300-f77151a4-20d2-4128-98b8-fd16d4df0297.png)
</details>





### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js Referrer: | [https://aternos.org/create/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Faternos.org%2Fcreate%2F)

comment.body:
I tested it and but it doesn't work. If you just click around on the website aternos.org/servers/ it works totally fine, 
![Unbenannt](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/106693139/224860340-2fb9df7a-49b8-4a09-b7ea-e4133cf481ee.PNG)

but if you're clicking on 'your own server' -button you'll will be redirected to aternos.org/server/ (the 's' is missing now in the url) and then the Adguard filter doesn't work there anymore.
![Unbwenannt](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/106693139/224860250-2b26e6a1-2c8d-46a4-85ca-20bb0fa85036.PNG)

:wave: @zloyden. Note that this link may also use `/fr/` _(my case :relaxed:)_ or `/en/` instead of `/nl/` — depending on the [language chosen](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4764956/224859048-43476bd2-72cf-4e69-b956-26ded6765a53.png) by the user. :wink: Thank you in advance for the slight update! :v:

issue.title: superhq.net, hentaikai.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension, AdGuard for Android, Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

4.0.642

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox, Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://superhq.net https://hentaikai.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. To see the image of a post you have to click on an image that redirects to another ad outside the site
2. Manage to resolve blocked 3rd party scripts from spacelala.com, I wondered if you could add this to the portuguese/spanish list

3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![Screenshot_20230314-005413](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/82182314/224889221-b2100145-3452-45b9-9c95-fc4aebb25da3.png)


</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

<
![Screenshot_20230314-005651](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/82182314/224889476-6d683f91-b59a-4edb-ad81-9a398465a641.png)


</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: superhq.net, hentaikai.com see images
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

To open the images, click on to be able to appear

https://www.superhq.net/2023/unexpected-moments.html

https://hentaikai.com/bijyo-to-yajyuu-gyaru-to-kimoota-2/

Unfortunately, I don't remember any other sites that have this.

### Proposed solution

block third party scripts from spacelala.com domain

### Additional information

_No response_
